description: Wall object representing boundary walls in PFC simulation. Cannot be instantiated directly - obtain instances via itasca.wall.list() or itasca.wall.find().
instantiation: Cannot be instantiated. Obtained via itasca.wall.list() or itasca.wall.find()

methods.name: closed
methods.description: Get the wall closure status. A closed wall is one where all edges are shared.

methods.name: contact_count
methods.signature: wall.contact_count(all: bool = False, type: TypeObject = None) -> int
methods.description: Get number of contacts associated with this Wall. If type is given, count is limited to specified contact types. If all is True, count includes virtual contacts.

methods.name: contacts
methods.signature: wall.contacts(piece: object = None, all: bool = False, type: TypeObject = None) -> tuple of Contact
methods.description: Get contacts associated with this Wall. Optional piece argument filters by Ball, Pebble or WallFacet. If type is given, list is limited to specified types. If all is True, includes virtual contacts.

parameters.name: piece
parameters.description: Filter by piece (Ball, Pebble, or WallFacet)

methods.name: convex
methods.description: Get the convexity status. The wall must also be closed to be convex.

methods.name: cutoff
methods.description: Get the cutoff angle. The cutoff angle is used during contact resolution to determine whether contact state information is propagated.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this wall.

methods.name: disp
methods.description: Get the wall displacement.

methods.name: disp_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: disp_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: disp_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: euler
methods.description: Get the wall orientation.

methods.name: euler_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: euler_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: euler_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: extra
methods.description: Get the wall extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: facets
methods.description: Get the facets of the wall.

methods.name: force_contact
methods.description: Get the wall contact force.

methods.name: force_contact_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: force_contact_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: force_contact_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: fragment
methods.description: Get the wall fragment ID.

methods.name: group
methods.signature: wall.group(slot: str or int = None) -> str
methods.description: Get the wall group name in a given slot.

methods.name: group_remove
methods.signature: wall.group_remove(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Remove from the given group from all group slots of the wall.

returns.description: True if group was removed from any slot

methods.name: groups
methods.description: Get a dictionary describing which groups this wall is part of. Keys are slot names, values are group names.

returns.description: Dictionary of slot to group name mappings

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get the wall id.

methods.name: in_group
methods.signature: wall.in_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Test if the wall is part of a given group. If slot is given, only that slot is searched. Otherwise, all group slots are searched.

returns.description: True if wall is in the group

methods.name: inside
methods.description: Test whether a point is inside a wall. The wall must be closed.

returns.description: True if point is inside the wall

methods.name: moment_contact
methods.description: Get the wall contact moment.

methods.name: moment_contact_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: moment_contact_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: moment_contact_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: name
methods.description: Get the wall name. Once a wall has been created its name cannot be changed.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get the wall location.

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall location.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall location.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall location.

methods.name: rotation_center
methods.description: Get the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: rotation_center_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: rotation_center_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: rotation_center_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: servo_active
methods.description: Get the wall servo activity status.

methods.name: servo_force
methods.description: Get the wall servo force.

methods.name: servo_gain
methods.description: Get the wall servo gain.

methods.name: servo_gainfactor
methods.description: Get the wall servo gain relaxation factor.

methods.name: servo_gainupdate
methods.description: Get the wall servo gain update interval.

methods.name: servo_set_active
methods.description: Set the wall servo activity status.

methods.name: servo_set_force
methods.description: Set the wall servo force.

methods.name: servo_set_gainfactor
methods.description: Set the wall servo gain relaxation factor.

methods.name: servo_set_gainupdate
methods.description: Set the wall servo gain update interval.

methods.name: servo_set_vmax
methods.description: Set the wall servo cap velocity.

methods.name: servo_vmax
methods.description: Get the wall servo cap velocity.

methods.name: set_cutoff
methods.description: Set the cutoff angle. The cutoff angle is used during contact resolution to determine whether contact state information is propagated.

methods.name: set_disp
methods.description: Set the wall displacement.

methods.name: set_disp_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: set_disp_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: set_disp_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall displacement.

methods.name: set_euler
methods.description: Set the wall orientation.

methods.name: set_euler_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: set_euler_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: set_euler_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall orientation.

methods.name: set_extra
methods.description: Set the wall extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: set_force_contact
methods.description: Set the wall contact force.

methods.name: set_force_contact_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: set_force_contact_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: set_force_contact_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall contact force.

methods.name: set_fragment
methods.description: Set wall fragment ID.

methods.name: set_group
methods.signature: wall.set_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> None
methods.description: Set the wall group name in a given slot.

methods.name: set_moment_contact
methods.description: Set the wall contact moment.

methods.name: set_moment_contact_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: set_moment_contact_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: set_moment_contact_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall contact moment.

methods.name: set_pos
methods.description: Set the wall location.

methods.name: set_pos_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall location.

methods.name: set_pos_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall location.

methods.name: set_pos_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall location.

methods.name: set_prop
methods.description: Set a property of all facets.

methods.name: set_rotation_center
methods.description: Set the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: set_rotation_center_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: set_rotation_center_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: set_rotation_center_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall center of rotation.

methods.name: set_spin
methods.description: Set the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: set_spin_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: set_vel
methods.description: Set the wall velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: spin
methods.description: Get the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: spin_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: spin_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: spin_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall angular velocity.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Returns True if this wall is live.

methods.name: vel
methods.description: Get the wall velocity.

methods.name: vel_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: vel_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: vel_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the wall velocity.

methods.name: vertices
methods.description: Get the vertices of this wall.
